metadata.title: CVE-2022-3553 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in X.orgServer. This affects an unknown part of the file hw/xquartz/X11Controller.mof the component xquartz. The manipulation leads to denial of service. Itis recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifierVDB-211053 was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
